title: Cinematic Trailer Themes
description: This is the professional 'Cinematic Trailer Themes' Pack - a collection of 12 carefully composed and orchestrated musical compositions for a wide range of genres you can use on your projects for trailers.
longDescription:
Soundcloud Preview: https://soundcloud.com/lyncisat/sets/cinematic-trailer-theme-pro-pack

This is the professional 'Cinematic Trailer Themes' Pack - a collection of 12 carefully composed and orchestrated musical compositions for a wide range of genres you can use on your projects for trailers. main themes, background music, title menu tracks ...

All 9 themes are available as the lite and pro version (which function as layer to the lite version) to give you full access and maximum possibilities of use. The lite tracks demonstrate the theme, the instrumentation and the genre in a lower density. The pro tracks bring more movement, color, density and complexity into the theme. If you want the music leave an recognizable impression and user experience music wise, then go for the pro track or even fade seamlessly from lite to pro wherever it suites your purpose! Check out the full Soundcloud playlist, where you can listen to all themes individually.

All themes are composed from scratch meant to be perfectly loop-able or as a stand alone music track. At the end of the Soundcloud preview playlist you can find a track with examples how my tracks transit from the end back to the start 100% seamlessly and without any recognizable 'breaks' within the crossover.

What do you get?
• 12 original composed & mixed tracks (20:21)

All tracks are?!
• CD quality 16bit/44.1khz .wav format, ready to use
• 100% loopable
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 21
Number of Audio Cues: 12
Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz @ 16 bit wave files
Does music\audio loop: Yes
How many sound FX: 0
How many minutes of audio provided: 2 x 15:54 min + 04:27 min (34:20 total)
Intended Platform: All
Documentation Included: No
Important\Additional Notes: The pack includes 9 main tracks, which come as a lite and a more complex & intense pro version plus 3 pro bonus tracks.
